attributes.action: Any further taxation or charges on road use can only be used in the provision of public transport.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Any further taxation or road charges should only be used for provision of public transport in order to support its aim of taking cars of the road.  This should fund additional public transport upon these routes at all times along if are charged by additional fees and taxes, along with faster rural services cutting journey times so they take a similar or faster time as private transport.
